reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-constructed with a nice pattern and luxurious feel, appreciating its perfect oversized fit with just the right amount of roominess.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft sweater with fun style!!
items.body: Heavier sweater just perfect for cold winter days. Oversized fit. I sized down to get the fit I prefer. I have washed a few times now. No noticeable changes afterwards. I do hang my sweaters to dry. It’s soft and cozy! Read more
items.author: PenD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shirt/sweater- comfy and large
items.body: Best shirt I've bought all year on Amazon! Thick, great quality, comfy. Keeps you warm and cozy, buying another color already. Dont pass this one up! Can use as thick shirt or sweater. Read more
items.author: Mom of three girls

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but washing instructions are weird and the bottom trim does not lay flat
items.body: Size Small, 5'4" 110 labs. I do love this sweater/sweatshirt. It fits big, but that's how I like it. It is so soft, and I like that the cuffs can be rolled up. I am surprised that no other reviewers have mentioned the trim at the bottom. Mine does not lay flat and is wrinkled more like a ruffle. It drives me crazy that it won't lay flat and is just too wide. I like the sweater enough that I am taking it to a tailor to have the bottom trim removed, or at least cut an inch off of it. It is also odd that in the machine wash instructions it said "in temperature under 30 degrees". Wouldn't that be freezing? It is made in China, so maybe it is just an incorrect translation. I washed in on COLD and hung it to dry to see if I could get the "ruffle" at the bottom to lay flat, but it did not work. Read more
items.author: Jean

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Order a sized down.
items.body: This is beautiful and stylish. The knit is thick, soft, and comfy. I don't like the latest style fad of "oversized" tops, so I ordered a size down and it's perfect. Read more
items.author: Pami Sue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater-love it!
items.body: Love the material style and comfort. Looks great. Read more
items.author: Theresa Gremel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater
items.body: Super soft and keeps you warm but not to heavy Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater, soft and well made.
items.body: Great sweater, soft and well made. Great value for the cost. Run LARGE, size down if you looking for a true to size fit. I wanted to wear it oversized with leggings and bought a large and I could have gone with a medium for the "oversized" look. I am 135#, 36D, 5'7". Read more
items.author: BBosco

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very oversized
items.body: This sweater is beautiful, warm and soooo soft! It is VERY oversized and I had to return it and size down two sizes to get a good fit and even then it is loose and roomy. I'm 5ft tall and 148 pounds and a small fits fine. It's warm and cozy without being big and bulky and the khaki color is very rich looking. This looks like a high end sweater without the expensive price tag. Read more
items.author: Anna Thorne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Khaki, Pure Green, Pure Pink, Black, Pure Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
